multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: equities; SFL Corp dividend cut may pressure oil supply and equity valuations.

category.motivation: The article reports a change in SFL Corp's dividend policy, which is a company update.

impact.motivation: The article reports a significant dividend cut for SFL Corp., directly affecting its financial performance and investor returns.

time_frame.motivation: The article reports a recent dividend cut and operational idleness, which are immediate events affecting the company.

article_node.title: SFL Corporation: Weighing The Fallout Of A Dividend Cut And An Idle Hercules Rig
article_node.summary: SFL Corp. (SFL) has reduced its quarterly dividend by 26% to $0.20 per share, citing the ongoing idleness of the Hercules vessel and lower revenues following a recent disposition. The article is written by a licensed professional engineer who specializes in the nuclear power sector and focuses on long‑term, income‑producing investments. Standard disclosures note that the author holds no positions in the referenced companies and that the piece is not a recommendation.
